Package com.intellij.psi

Interface ElementManipulator<T extends PsiElement>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractElementManipulator, CommandLineElementManipulator, GrArgumentLabelManipulator, GroovyStringLiteralManipulator, HeaderValuePartManipulator, IgnoreEntryManipulator, JsonStringLiteralManipulator, MarkdownCodeFenceImpl.Manipulator, MarkdownLinkDestinationImpl.Manipulator, PlainFileManipulator, PropertyKeyManipulator, PropertyManipulator, PropertyValueManipulator, PsiCommentManipulator, PsiDocTagValueManipulator, PyKeywordArgumentManipulator, PyReferenceExpressionManipulator, PyStringLiteralExpressionManipulator, RestLineManipulator, RncFileReferenceManipulator, ShLiteralManipulator, SimpleTagManipulator, StringLiteralManipulator, XmlAttributeManipulator, XmlAttributeValueManipulator, XmlProcessingInstructionManipulator, XmlTagManipulator, XmlTextManipulator, XmlTokenManipulator, YAMLScalarElementManipulator

    public interface ElementManipulator<T extends PsiElement>
    Handles value text change and provides its underlying TextRange for specific PsiElement.
    See Also:
    AbstractElementManipulator, ElementManipulators

      Returns value text range.

      T handleContentChange(T element, TextRange range, java.lang.String newContent)
      Changes the element's text to the given new text.

        Changes the element's text to the given new text.
        Parameters:
